SIGNUP FOR THE WALLET

How it works

Secured by the Ethereum blockchain, and in partnerships with local service providers, Everex lets you send, receive, earn interest, and safely keep eMoney and digital assets in a secured digital wallet.

Add Money

Add EUC, USDC, DAI, EVX or GBC to the wallet with local bank or P2P transfer.

Send

Pay other people or make a transfer of eMoney across the world in one minute.

Receive

Get paid for your work or receive eMoney direct to your wallet P2P.

Withdraw

Cash out any eMoney in your local currency. We support EUR, GBP, THB.

Cross-Border Currency Exchange and Transfers

GBP <> EUR <> USDT<> EVX <> USDC <> DAI

Discover How To Change GBP and Euro to Stablecoins. Money transfer services use an old system with outdated technology making you pay hidden withdrawal or transfer fees when you send money globally.

  • Receive money

Get started

Withdraw cash without a bank account

When you receive money you will get 2 reference codes in your wallet. Go to any ATM of Krungthai Bank and select the E-cheque option. Withdraw cash up to 20,000 THB at a time.

Everex Provides Access To eMoney From Your Bank Account

The World Crypto Markets At Your Fingertips

From dollars in the bank to dollars on blockchain

1. Add Money to the wallet to receive USDC or EVX
2. Send USDC or EVX to the Exchange of Your Choice
3. Buy or sell cryptocurrencies or digital assets*

From dollars on blockchain to dollars in the bank

1. You can sell crypto for USDC or EVX on the exchange of your choice
2. You can send USDC or EVX to Everex wallet
3. You can withdraw to your local bank account or via ATM

Blockchain Powered Wallet for eMoney and Digital Assets

Everex Wallet provides convenient and fast payment gateway between fiat and eMoney stored on Ethereum blockchain. With the recent wallet upgrade, the application now supports USDC, DAI and native Everex token, EVX. Everex wallet is the best application for:

  • eMoney powered peer-to-peer money transfers
  • Payment gateway for deposits and withdrawals
  • Domestic payments with instant settlements
  • Earning interest with DeFi lending protocols*
  • Fiat to cryptocurrency payment gateway.

Intelligent architecture makes private keys management intuitive and convenient for the end users and does not require sophisticated knowledge of crypto security. Basic Security Level allows users to operate without worrying of private key safekeeping, by using simple PIN code instead. Although such simplicity comes at price. The Basic level is limited to $1000 worth of combined worth of assets in market price and balance equivalents. The maximum total balance allowed to be kept in the wallet with highest security level is limited to the equivalent of $20,000 in eMoney and digital assets.

Breaching Borders and Bridging Gaps

Everex offers eMoney powered payment solutions, digital national currencies, money transfers and customer friendly ways to manage digital assets
